document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Zhu, Chao-Dong & Kuhlmann, Michael
document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the Colletes clypearis - group (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China with descriptions of seven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the Colletes clypearis - group (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China with descriptions of seven new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes floralis Eversmann, 1852
-Eversmann 1852 ∶ 46 ; Nοskiewicz 1936 ∶ 441 ; Οsytshnϳuk & Rοmankοva 1995 ∶ 483 ; Davydοva & Pesenkο 2002 ∶ 583 ; Kuh 1 mann & Dοrn 2002 ∶ 96 ; Prοshcha 1 ykin 2003 a∶ 26 ; 2003 b∶ 5 ; 2004 ∶ 3 ; 2007 a∶ 89 ; 2007 b∶ 878 ; 2008 ∶ 2 ; 2010 ∶ 509 ; Prοshcha 1 ykin et al. 2004 ∶ 159 ; Ignatenkο 2004 ∶ 109 ; Kuh 1 mann 2009 a∶ 18 ; 2009 b∶ 28 ; Quest 2009 ∶ 120 ; Prοshcha 1 ykin & Quest 2009 ∶ 239 ; Kuh 1 mann & Prοshcha 1 ykin 2011 ∶ 14 -15, 36∶ ♂ (
Figure 15
, a, b), 46 ∶ ♀ (
Figure 25
, a, b).

Colletes kudiensis
Cοckere11, 1924-Cοckere 11 1924 ∶ 594 . Synοnymised by Nοskiewicz 1936 ∶ 437 , synοnymy cοnfirmed by Kuh 1 mann 1999 ∶ 77 .

Colletes yasumatsui Hirashima
& Ikudοme, 1989 -Ikudοme 1989 ∶ 109-117 . Synοnymized by Kuh 1 mann 2003 ∶ 731 .

Distribution in China .
Hebei, Guangdong, Yunnan, Xinjiang, Xizang, Qinghai (
Fig. 30
c).

General distribution. Spain , Ireland , Great Britain , France , Norway , Sweden , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Italy , Finland , Poland , Czech Republic , Hungary , Croatia , Greece , Turkey , Belarus , Russia , Georgia , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Tajikistan , Iran , Mongolia , China , India , Japan . First record for China .

Tamarix
sp. ( Tamaricaceae ), Compositae gen. et sp. ( Asteraceae ),
Brassica chinensis
( Brassicaceae ).
